--------------------
Text: The Battle of Hürtgen Forest (German: "Schlacht im Hürtgenwald" ) was a series of fierce battles fought from 19 September to 16 December 1944 between American and German forces on the Western Front during World War II in the Hürtgen Forest about 50 mi2 east of the Belgian–German border.
Triplets:<The Battle of Hürtgen Forest
1:
--------------------
Text: Battle of Hürtgen Forest:  It was the longest battle on German ground during World War II, and is the longest single battle the U.S. Army has ever fought.
